name: Crush things with car - ASMR
description:
-- Crush everything to pieces --

Stop watching those videos, and start crushing things now!

100% realistic Physics engine:

A bunch of engineers have worked so hard to create the best simulation game for crushing objects under the car tires. Enjoy unlimited crushing of:

- Slime
- Squishy
- floral foam
- Balls (basketball, Golf, rugby etc.)
- Phones
- Bottles
- Lightbulbs
- Bowling Balls
- Cups
- Dishes
- Flashlights
- Cars
- Remote Controls
- Lollipops
- Lighters
- Toothpaste

More and more items are being added with every update, It's time to get the satisfaction of crushing stuff all the time, in the palm of your hands with the ultimate ASMR experience in any app.
